Marketing Campaigns

From Scripting Workshops viewed by thousands of people to writing concise Instagram with captions that optimize engagement. With over three years of experiences I have worked with students in all disciplines, and launched full scale campaigns that have increased impressions by upto 20% Whether you need to promote the founding of your club or you're preparing for the launch of your new course; I've got you covered

Personal Websites

For the last two years, I have been helping Students flesh out their ideas for Clubs, Non-profits, and even their own startups and turn them into sleek, aesthetic, and Unique websites, that display not only their goals but their values. this unique approach to building websites allow's you your new initiave to not only attract but retain a community of loyal followers for whatever your personal brand might be. Upon purchase I will call you within 24 hours to plan the end-to-end design of your custom website!

Notion Templates

For the past year I have crafted CRM'S, Team Collaboration Workspaces, OKR dashboards, Habit tracking Systems, and more. Used by med students, dental students, engineering students, and professionals. Notion is a popular tool because of it's "One stop shop" functionality for life management; it is used by students everywhere as their main time management resource and throuought my time working as a learning coach I have helped dozens of students build those life management systems.
